Cs, PP i Vox carreguen contra TV3 en el debat i avisen que la intervindran si governen
Arrimadas aposta per aplicar el 155 de manera immediata i cessar el director

05 Nov 2019, 21:50

Contra TV3. Així han arrencat Cs, PP i Vox el debat electoral organitzat per la televisió catalana. La candidata taronja, Inés Arrimadas, ha criticat que és una "maquinària de propaganda" i ha exigit la dimissió del director, Vicent Sanchis, que era precisament qui moderava el debat. "Vostè no se'n va ni amb aigua calenta", li ha dit Arrimadas al periodista. Ha afegit que, si governa el seu partit -cosa que les enquestes veuen difícil-, tornaran a aplicar l'article 155 i "el primer" que faran serà cessar a Sanchis. El director de la televisió pública catalana no ha volgut entrar en la polèmica: "No li puc contestar perquè no em presento a les eleccions". Malgrat això, ha donat les gràcies pels "suggeriments". 
La candidata del PP, Cayetana Álvarez de Toledo, ha començat en la mateixa línia, centrant els seus atacs contra TV3: "No han construït una nació, han construït una secta", ha etzibat. Segons ella, el canal propaga "un profund odi a Espanya" i ha assegurat que havia contemplat no acudir al debat, però finalment sí que ho ha fet. "Per respecte democràtic als catalans". Tant Arrimadas com Álvarez de Toledo han criticat durant el debat i també a Twitter la presència de llaços grocs a les instal·lacions de TV3. 






Vox ha fet el mateix. Ignacio Garriga ha considerat que TV3 va ser peça clau del "cop d'estat" d'octubre de 2017 i ha dit que, si el seu partit forma part del proper govern espanyol, "intervindran" la televisió. De fet, ha carregat contra taronges i populars per no haver-ho fet quan ja es va aplicar el 155.

Cs, PP and Vox charge against TV3 in the debate and warn that they will intervene if they govern
Closed bets to apply the 155 immediately and stop the director

05 Nov 2019, 21:50

Against TV3. This has led Cs, PP and Vox to the electoral debate organized by Catalan television. The orange candidate, Inés Arrimadas, has criticized the fact that it is a "propaganda machinery" and demanded the resignation of the director, Vicent Sanchis, who was precisely who moderated the debate. "You do not go away with hot water," Arrimadas told the journalist. He added that if he rules his party - because surveys see it difficult - they will return to apply article 155 and "the first" they will do will be to stop at Sanchis. The director of Catalan public television did not want to enter into the controversy: "I can not answer because I do not appear in the elections." In spite of this, he has thanked for the "suggestions".
The candidate of the PP, Cayetana Álvarez de Toledo, has begun in the same vein, focusing their attacks on TV3: "They have not built a nation, they have built a sect," he has eaten. According to her, the channel spreads "a deep hate in Spain" and assured that she had contemplated not going to the debate, but finally she did. "For democratic respect for the Catalans". Both Arrimadas and Álvarez de Toledo have criticized during the debate and also on Twitter the presence of yellow bows in the facilities of TV3.






Vox did the same. Ignacio Garriga has considered that TV3 was a key piece of the "coup d'etat" of October 2017 and said that if his party is part of the next Spanish government, "they will take part" the television. In fact, it has loaded against oranges and popular ones because it did not do it when 155 was already applied.
